snippet: Clement I. Gardner, the top financial officer for a charity started by State Senator Rubén Díaz Sr., was arrested and accused of stealing at least $75,000 from the organization.
abstract: Clement I Gardner, top financial officer for the Christian Community Benevolent Association, is arrested and accused of stealing at least $75,000 from the organization.
lead_paragraph: Clement I. Gardner, the top financial officer for a charity started by State Senator Rubén Díaz Sr., was arrested and accused of stealing at least $75,000 from the organization.

headline.seo: Clement I. Gardner, Bronx Charity Official, Is Charged With Grand Larceny
headline.main: Charity Officer Is Charged With Stealing
headline.print_headline: Charity Officer Is Charged With Stealing
